about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

King Rooster TD is a hand-drawn Brazilian game that combines Tower Defense and Action RPG.
Build the perfect defense with towers, skills, upgrades, hero, and face over 200 types of enemies in an exciting strategy game. With each win, you can evolve your hero, skills, inventory, and build a winning strategy. Additionally, conduct research, obtain rare loot, win different stages, and earn unique achievements, competing for your position among the best players.

FEATURES

King Rooster TD features 12 incredibly powerful rooster towers, each with unique upgrades and abilities. Additionally, players have the opportunity to customize their own hero, choosing from a wide variety of skills, equipment, and special enhancements. The game also offers a unique system of loot, research, and treasures to reward players. In addition to the "Attack" mode, where you take on the role of your hero and counter-attack enemies in a roguelike style, facing a massive number of millions of opponents!

A MYSTERIOUS WORLD

King Rooster TD is a game that never ends! With 80 unique stages and an unlimited wave level in each one, you'll never run out of challenges to face. Each game is a different tactical challenge, with the simian knowledge offering over 20 hero skills that add power where you need it to face difficult maps and more challenging matches.

AN ENDLESS GAME

King Rooster TD can be played anywhere, including offline, and offers a variety of customization features. Each stage can be reached at an unlimited endless wave level, with the ability to evolve your hero as you gain experience and compete in the ranking to become the best player. Come experience the challenge and fun of King Rooster TD!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
